item.title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
item.description: President Uchtdorf presents names of General Authorities and other Church leaders for sustaining vote; he also announces the release of various leaders.

item.description: Church Auditing Department managing director Kevin R. Jergensen reads the auditing report for 2016.
